articles.title: Scientists observe longitudinal plasmonic field in nanocavity at subnano-scale - Phys.org
articles.description: A group of scientists working on surface-enhanced Raman spectroscopy (SERS) has made a nanoruler to provide insight into the longitudinal plasmonic fields in nanocavities, according to research published in the Journal of the American Chemical Society.
